# Simple Python projects with requirements.txt
Use uv and requirements.txt to set up simple Python projects.

## Configuration files
* requirements.txt (edit dependencies here)
* uv.lock (auto-generated by uv)
* .python-version (auto-generated by uv)

## Quickstart
* Use `install-uv.bat` to install uv.exe.
* Use `make-venv-uv.bat 3.12` to pin a Python version.
* Use `make-venv-uv.bat` to activate Python from .venv
